segments.text: Ugh, what a disgusting mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink’s overflowing with dirty water all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s streaming down the cabinet doors like slime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s standing in that filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe must be soaked through with grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s drying dishes right next to this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now look at those kids rummaging in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s on a rickety stool, about to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re sneaking treats like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s just waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor’s slippery and wet, what a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can’t hide this filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m repulsed by how no one’s fixing it.
segments.speaker: PAR
